author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: لِيْ مِنْ قَلَمِكَ الأَعْلى خَيْرَ الآخِرَةِ وَالأُولی، أَشْهَدُ أَنَّ فِي قَبْضَتِكَ زِمامَ الأُمُورِ تُبَدِّلُها كَيْفَ تَشآءُ، لا إِلهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ القَوِيُّ الأَمينُ، أَنْتَ الَّذِيْ
translation: Do Thou ordain for me through Thy most exalted Pen, O my Lord, the good of this world and of the next. I testify that within Thy grasp are held the reins of all things. Thou changest them as Thou pleasest. No God is there save Thee, the Strong, the Faithful.
